fixes.name: Delta Down T GBP Fix
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T GBP] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level addition from Tableau converted to a DAX calculated column. Tableau field references were transformed to DAX table column syntax: [Field] -> 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Field]. No aggregates or parameters are used, so this remains a calculated column.
